Section.Catchline: Registered office and registered agent of foreign limited liability company.

SectionBody.Text: Each foreign limited liability company in this state must continuously maintain in this state:

Subsection.Text: A registered office that may be the same as any of its places of business.
A registered agent, which may be either:

Paragraph.Text: An individual who resides in this state and whose business office is identical with the registered office; or
A foreign or domestic entity authorized to transact business in this state which has a business office identical with the registered office.
